DOC.brief_summary: The aim of this study is to find out why HIV continues to make copies in people taking HIV drugs. The investigators want to know if the medications most people use to treat HIV get into the lymphatic tissue where HIV persists.
DOC.brief_title: Tissue Drug Levels of HIV Medications
